43.heading: Lofficier, Jean-Marc, 1954-
43.title: Madwoman of the Sacred Heart
43.author: story by Alexandro Jodorowsky; art by Jean "Moebius" Giraud ; letters by Dave Cooper ; translated by Randy and Jean-Marc Lofficier.
notes: Translation of: Le Coeur Couronné 1: La Folie du Sacre-Coeur.

Summary: "In a world of narco-terrorism, fifty-second soundbites, and multi-national corporations, how would we deal with a new Savior? Would we, like the Romans, even be aware of the birth of a new Messiah? Could we tell the difference between John the Baptist and just another sect of nuts?"

108.heading: Lofficier, Randy, 1953-
108.title: Madwoman of the Sacred Heart
108.author: story by Alexandro Jodorowsky; art by Jean "Moebius" Giraud ; letters by Dave Cooper ; translated by Randy and Jean-Marc Lofficier.
notes: Translation of: Le Coeur Couronné 1: La Folie du Sacre-Coeur.

Summary: "In a world of narco-terrorism, fifty-second soundbites, and multi-national corporations, how would we deal with a new Savior? Would we, like the Romans, even be aware of the birth of a new Messiah? Could we tell the difference between John the Baptist and just another sect of nuts?"
